code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[city,setCity]=useState('');const[weather,setWeather]=useState(null);const fetchWeather=async()=>{const response=await fetch("/weather?city=".concat(city));const data=await response.json();setWeather(data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Weather App"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:city,onChange:e=>setCity(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter city"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchWeather,children:"Get Weather"}),weather&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(weather,null,2)})]});}export default App;
